attributes.action: Support and promote distributed or parallel computing to improve research efforts in medicine, the sciences and other fields where a large amount of computing power is needed to help solve problems for the benefit of every person.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Did you know that by running a screensaver on your PC, you can help research into a cure for cancer or heart disease? These and many other problems are being researched using Distributed Computing.

Distributed Computing refers to the use of many computers to solve computational problems. In distributed computing, a problem is divided into many tasks, each of which is solved by one computer.

The Government should raise awareness of the benefits to society of Distributed Computing.

People and businesses in the public and private sectors should be encouraged by the Government to donate their computer's spare processing power to help very important research, for the benefit of everyone. Even the Government's computers should be put to good use in this way.

Please sign this petition to support the use of Distributed Computing.
